channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 5 Money Lies Keeping Americans Poor, According to Jaspreet Singh
‘China’s car market has lost all reason’ – the country’s largest western carmaker refuses to compete in Tesla and BYD’s EV price war
Nvidia may resume China sales, but this strategist is hesitant
Pam Bondi abruptly fires Justice Department’s top ethics chief in four-sentence letter
Eight everyday foods that lower your risk of a heart attack (and one of them is chocolate)
Nextdoor social site, looking for a revival, pins hopes on local news partnerships
item.description: The neighborhood social site Nextdoor is hoping for a revival by turning to local news providers

item.title: Winning numbers drawn in Monday’s Powerball
item.description: The winning numbers in Monday evening’s drawing of the "Powerball" game were: 08-12-45-46-63, Powerball: 24

item.title: Native American teens kayak major US river to celebrate removal of dams and return of salmon
item.description: A group of several dozen Indigenous youth from across the Klamath Basin recently emerged victorious after a month-long journey paddling the Klamath Ri...

item.title: NYC subway service operational but some roads in NY and NJ remain closed after heavy rains
item.description: New York City’s subway system is fully operational following overnight heavy rains

item.title: Murder trial begins for Colorado dentist accused of poisoning wife's protein shakes
item.description: A Colorado dentist accused of killing his wife of 23 years by poisoning her protein shakes begins trial with opening arguments this week
